Village_Settlement: Chencuo is part of the Daqiu Administrative Village 大丘行政村. The current population of Chencuo village is approximately 400 people.
Surname_Groups: The main surname groups are the Zheng 郑, the Su 苏, and the Lin 林. Each year each group selects by rotation one Fushou 福首.
Village_Temples: Jurengong 聚仁宫 was built in Kangxi 54 (1715) and demolished in 1958. In 1980 it was rebuilt, and is now the main overall Pugong 铺宫 temple of the thirty-six village alliance of Hushi. Currently, representatives from each of the thirty-six villages still sit on the temple management
